body_html:
Try decreasing the learning rate in the step,
optimizer = tf.train.AdagradOptimizer(learning_rate=0.1) to

optimizer = tf.train.AdagradOptimizer(learning_rate=0.001) (or smaller value)

and try again.

This might help you.

body:
Try decreasing the learning rate in the step,
optimizer = tf.train.AdagradOptimizer(learning_rate=0.1) to
 
optimizer = tf.train.AdagradOptimizer(learning_rate=0.001) (or smaller value)

and try again. 

This might help you.
